description: This classic tiramisu recipe is the perfect no-bake dessert to make ahead and serve at any occasion.
name: Classic Tiramisu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dip half the biscuits, one at a time, in coffee mixture for a few seconds, then place in a single layer over the base of a 20cm (8cm deep) round dish. Spread with half the cream mixture. Repeat with remaining biscuits, coffee and cream mixtures. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Dust with cocoa, just before serving.

Repeat with remaining biscuits, coffee and cream mixtures. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Dust with cocoa, just before serving.

Repeat with remaining biscuits, coffee and cream mixtures. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Dust with cocoa, just before serving.
